member.name: T:Tetris.ConsoleRenderer
member.summary: A console renderer class responsible for rendering the visual content on the console

member.name: T:Tetris.IRenderer
member.summary: An intereface should be implemented by every renderer. It is used by the engine.

member.summary: Renderes the next scene on the console

member.name: T:Tetris.Engine
member.summary: The engine of the game. Responsible for following the logic and the rules of the game. The entrance point of the game.

member.name: F:Tetris.Engine.RotationSleepTime
member.summary: The default sleep time for every step in the game

member.name: F:Tetris.Engine.FastSpeed
member.summary: The speed of the figures when down button is pressed

member.name: F:Tetris.Engine.renderer
member.summary: The renderer of the engine

member.name: F:Tetris.Engine.userInterface
member.summary: The user interface object resposible for handling the user input.

member.name: F:Tetris.Engine.figureGenerator
member.summary: The figure generator which the engine works with. It can be passed in the constructor.

member.name: F:Tetris.Engine.staticObjects
member.summary: A list, containing the collected figures in the game

member.name: F:Tetris.Engine.nextFigure
member.summary: The next figure to be positioned on the field

member.name: F:Tetris.Engine.currentFigure
member.summary: The current falling figure

member.name: F:Tetris.Engine.speed
member.summary: The current speed of the figures

member.name: F:Tetris.Engine.normalSpeed
member.summary: The normal speed of the figure (it can be changed in the future if we want to add levels for example)

member.name: F:Tetris.Engine.gameOver
member.summary: True if the game is over and false if not

member.name: F:Tetris.Engine.score
member.summary: The current score of the player

member.summary: Constructs the engine with default figure generator
member.param: An IRenderer object
An IUserInterface object

An IUserInterface object
An IFigureGenerator

member.summary: Attaches the events handlers for the input events

member.summary: Determines if a given object is on a valid position
member.param: The object whose position to be checked for validity
member.returns: True - if the object is on valid position, false - otherwise

member.summary: Checkes if two game objects are in collision
member.param: The first game object
The second game object
member.returns: True if the objects are in collision, false - otherwise

member.summary: Removes the full lines and changes the position and the image of the affected objects

member.name: M:Tetris.Engine.MakeStep
member.summary: Makes one step in the game and calls the Update() method of every non-static object in the game

member.summary: The current speed of the figures

member.name: P:Tetris.Engine.NormalSpeed
member.summary: The normal speed of the figure (it can be changed in the future if we want to add levels for example)

member.name: T:Tetris.Figure
member.summary: The generic figure class which implements the main functionality of a figure. All figures inherits from it.

member.summary: The main object in the game, every visible object on the field inherits from it
